did.unittitle: Philadelphia Museum of Art Administration/Management records

bioghist.p: Under Eugene W. Kuthy, the Associate Director for Museum Management from February 1982 until December 1982, the Department had responsibility for Finance and Control, Personnel, Marketing, Building Operations and Membership. Kuthy also served as liaison between city and state governments and PMA.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records of the Administration/Management department. This department's records include "day files" of Eugene Kuthy, which consist primarily of his outgoing correspondence, from February to December 1982, arranged chronologically. There are also records from several exhibitions that opened or were being organized during Kuthy's tenure, including, "The Pennsylvania Germans," "Treasures of Ancient Nigeria," and shows of the works of Landseer and Eakins. Subject files include topics such as lobbying, other Philadelphia cultural institutions, and museum committees. The collection also includes memos and correspondence from Kuthy, and copies of memos and correspondence from other offices.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
